## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G13550](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G13550)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>CIN4, COP10, EMB144, FUS9</u>
- **Gene Name:** CYTOKININ-INSENSITIVE 4, CONSTITUTIVE PHOTOMORPHOGENIC 10, EMBRYO DEFECTIVE 144, FUSCA 9
- **Description:**   Ubiquitin-conjugating enzyme family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [CS3753]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;defective in the induction of ethylene biosynthesis by the interaction between light and cytokinin; phenotype consistent with a weak constitutive photomorphogenic fus9/cop10 mutant; high levels of anthocyanins; dark-grown seedlings resemble de-etiolated light-grown wt appearance: shortened hypocotyl, expanded cotyledons, expanded true leaves, and partial conversion of etioplasts into chloroplasts.
